summary: This mod adds the ability to quickly create a new “CREATURE”armor (version 1.4: 34 possible) with the fire of the forge + in the Miscellaneous File: Incarnate Molag Bal (only - standalone mod).
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b]Incarnate Creatures[/b][/color][color=#00ff00][b] version 1.4[/b][/color] (No DLC NEEDED)

[color=#00ff00] Optional File: Esp Version Française [/color]

[color=#00ff00] Miscellaneous File: Incarnate Molag Bal (only - standalone mod). NO DLC Required [/color]

This mod adds the ability to quickly create a new “CREATURE” armor with the fire of the forge

To obtain these [color=#00ff00][b]34 [/b][/color]Creatures Armors*, go to a forge and create the " XXXX Armor" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Outfit" (“Tenue” in French) and they are there. You only have to try…

*[color=#ff0000]Creatures Armors[/color] :Minotaur, Dwarvcenturions (2), Dwarvcommander, Dwarvdolls (7), Dwarvgynoids (2), Dwarvtrooper, Ebony Knight, Flame Lord, Knight of Order, Malaburo, Mara, Molag Bal, Molag Bal Rusty, Skeletons (7), Chicken Man, [url=http://witcher.wikia.com/wiki/Draugir] Draugir [/url], [url=http://witcher.wikia.com/wiki/Drowner] Drowner [/url], [url=http://witcher.wikia.com/wiki/Drowned_dead] Drowned Dead [/url], [url=http://witcher.wikia.com/wiki/Rotfiend] Rotfiend [/url] and [url=http://witcher.wikia.com/wiki/Greater_rotfiend] Greater Rotfiend [/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/KD911Pk.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000] Video with the version 1.1.2 between 0’ and 7’58’’[/color] (Thanks to KnightStreakGaming)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]1idtRUtOSnA[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-


[color=#ff0000][b] INSTALLATION [/b][/color]

[color=#00ff00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "


[color=#ff0000][b] Bugs or Problems[/b][/color]

No first person view (the hands) for the "Flame Lord" and the "Draugir"

Impossible to change the size of the "GREATER Rotfiend"



[color=#ff0000] [size="6"] [b]Credits [/b][/size][/color]

1) For the Dwarvcenturions (2), the Dwarvcommander, the Dwarvdolls (7), The Dwarvgynoids (2), the Dwarvtrooper, the Ebony Knight, the Flame Lord, the Knight of Order, the Malaburo, the Mara, the Molag Bal, the Molag Bal Rusty, the Skeletons (7)...Armors !

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Vicn [/color] in his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Vicn Creature Resource [/url](”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”); and the team of the Female Creatures (Dwarven Gynoid):ECE Team, dimon99, Radioragae, REN, Peggy, NewSea, SKS

2) For the Draugir, the Drowners (2) and the Rotfiends (2)

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Gendundrup [/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49682/?]Nexus Creature Resource[/url] (Skyrim "Modders resources and tutorials"); Derivative work from the models of the games “The Witcher, The Witcher 2” from [url=http://en.cdprojektred.com/] CD Projekt Red [/url] (“Permission was given by the Witcher makers to use these assets as long as they were properly credited.” “Lispuppy” moderator of the [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1375232-witcher-assets/] Nexus forum [/url] 03/02/2014)

3) For the Chicken Man

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]ErianDragonborn [/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56829/?]Chicken Mod [/url]

4) For the Minotaur

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00] Dogtown1[/color] in his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35631/?] SkyMoMod [/url]
author: gg77

files.name: Esp Version Francaise pour la Version 1-4
files.fileName: Esp Version Francaise pour la Version 1-4-56537-1-4.7z
files.changelogHtml:
New in the Version 1.4: Adds a Minotaur

New in the Version 1.3: Adds 2 Skeletons Demon and a Chicken Man !

New in the Version 1.1.2: minor change with a name

New in the Version 1.1.1: minor changes with the 2 centurions

New in the Version 1.1: Adds Draugir, Drowners (2) and Rotfiends (2) + a new Dwarvgynoid

Version 1.0: Dwarvcenturions (2), Dwarvcommander, Dwarvdolls (7), Dwarvgynoid, Dwarvtrooper, Ebony Knight, Flame Lord, Knight of Order, Malaburo, Mara, Molag Bal, Molag Bal Rusty, Skeletons (5)
